traits.name: Echolocation
entries: The hook horror can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hook horror makes two hook attacks.

actions.name: Hook
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
